amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to implement a watchlist for passengers of cruise ships.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3841 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3841 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S10351-10358) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to implement a watchlist for passengers of cruise ships.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3841 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3841 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Nelson FL.
